author: Merlo, Aurélie
title: Système de prédiction de néologismes formels : le cas des N suffixés par -IER dénotant des artefacts (Prediction Device of Formal Neologisms : the Case of -IER Suffixed Nouns Denoting Artifacts) [in French]
